description: The Open Source modelling toolkit for creating ArchiMate models and sketches
pre_install: (Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri 'https://www.archimatetool.com/download').Content -match "<script type='text/javascript' src='(?<GlobalJsUrl>[a-z0-9/\.\?=:\-]+)' id='global-js'>" ; $GlobalJsUrl=$Matches.GlobalJsUrl ; (Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri $GlobalJsUrl).Content -match 'attr\("name", "(?<DownloadKey>.+)"' ; $DownloadKey=$Matches.DownloadKey ; busybox.exe wget -O $dir\Archi-Win64-$version.zip --post-data "$DownloadKey=archi%2F$version%2FArchi-Win64-$version.zip" https://www.archimatetool.com/downloads/
